amendatorysection.catchline: Summer Food Service Program; terms, defined.
amendatorysection.para: (1) Department means the State Department of Education; and

(2) Sponsor means a public or private nonprofit school food authority, local, municipal, or county government, public or private nonprofit higher education institution participating in the National Youth Sports Program, or residential public or private nonprofit summer camp that provides food service similar to food service made available to children during the school year under the school lunch program or the school breakfast program under the Child Nutrition Act of 1966, 42 U.S.C. 1771 et seq.
